website_summaries.verdict: Not only do you get a wide variety of cute mini-cacti candles in this 18-piece set, these charming decorations are easier to keep than a real cactus.
pros: 4 to 5 hours of burn time per candle
cons: Some designs are more realistic than others

website_summaries.verdict: A thoughtful and aesthetically pleasing party favor. Perfect for plant and candle lovers alike.
pros: Candles are brightly colored and made from Eco-friendly paraffin wax
Highly detailed to look like real succulents
Set of 18 comes with thank you card for your guests as well
Metal candle holder keeps melted wax from spilling
cons: Only one thank you card is included
For multiple guests you'll need to make copies

customer_reviews.title: Very cute, overall happy with my purchase
customer_reviews.text: They're much cuter in person! They come in 3 different packets of 6, each one a different type of cactus/succulent and each packet had its own color. Some had a good amount of color and others not so much, so that was the only downside. But other than that, I like them a lot and used them as party favors for a birthday (hence the tinsel wrapped around them).
customer_reviews.author: Priscilla Torres

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful!!
customer_reviews.text: This candles are just adorable, great price and the package presentation is very good, this makes a good gift or piece of decoration.
customer_reviews.author: JosieRoo

customer_reviews.title: Couple of misses, but most look great
customer_reviews.text: I got these for a desk decoration, and overall I like them quite a lot. 2/3 boxes were great, and i liked every piece. The third had some misses though, particularly with the succulent-shaped ones with red tips. The red was obviously painted on, not airbrushed, so they stand out among the others which look more convincing. 14/18 that worked for me isnt bad though, so I'm happy regardless. I'll just burn the ones that didnt work out sometime.
customer_reviews.author: Ap

customer_reviews.title: A great shower gift or present for a plant lover!
customer_reviews.text: This was a great purchase and well loved at my baby shower. I included a cute poem that said to light it when baby was born and several people did just that. I love succulents and cacti and these were very cute replicas especially for small tea lights. I did have one arrive broken but I simply melted the rip and reattached. As far as I can tell this had the most candles per package for the price and they were almost all different.
customer_reviews.author: Aria

customer_reviews.title: High quality exact wax duplicates of cactus
customer_reviews.text: These candle wax replicas of cacti are perfect conversational pieces which will delight friends, family, and guests. I love my set so much that I removed the wicks, so there's no possibility of lighting the little candles.
customer_reviews.author: GaryWW

customer_reviews.title: Nice little favors
customer_reviews.text: Nice little candles, they come well packed and the quality is excellent. Used them as decoration with a pot and then gave them out as favors, people loved them
customer_reviews.author: Nanito

customer_reviews.title: very cute! but doesn't stay in their tin
customer_reviews.text: I really love these and are giving them as party favors for my wedding. They are packaged super cute in packs of six. I wish they would stay in the tin they come in though. I had to super glue the wick down and tried super gluing and hot gluing them into the tin but it doesnt stay in. Other than that they are super cute and make for a great gift!
customer_reviews.author: Javier

customer_reviews.title: Great Party Favor
customer_reviews.text: These are very cute and detailed. Great value for what you get. I'm going to open and hand them out individually as party favors. If I was going to give them as a gift(6pieces) it wouldn't be so great because 2 of the candles are on their side in the package.
customer_reviews.author: Sunshine

customer_reviews.title: Nice well done Small candles
customer_reviews.text: They are very nice well done. They are SMALL so watch out of your seperating them to give as favors.
customer_reviews.author: R. Melendez

customer_reviews.title: Super simple and adorable.
customer_reviews.text: Adorable mini cactus variety candles.They were perfect favors for our housewarming party. Will definitely purchase again.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: So cute, but small
customer_reviews.text: These are adorable. They are tea light sized at the bottom and only a couple of inches tall. I wish they were a bit bigger, but they are adorable.
customer_reviews.author: T.O.

customer_reviews.title: So cute!
customer_reviews.text: They look so real. I don't even want to light them!! Would make great favors or as a little token "Thank you". Highly recommend for a lovely presentation item!
customer_reviews.author: Catherine Maynard

customer_reviews.title: Perfect guest gifts
customer_reviews.text: These were a hit at Thanksgiving as guest gifts. Everyone wanted more.
customer_reviews.author: julsv

customer_reviews.title: Small and elegant
customer_reviews.text: I purchased these little candles for a birthday party center piece. I topped them off in a glass bubble vase with sand. They are small get very detailed and worked perfectly. It was the perfect touch for the party centerpieces.
customer_reviews.author: Jill H.

customer_reviews.title: Ordered 106 of them
customer_reviews.text: And 106 arrived, perfectly intact and THEY ARE THE CUTEST THINGS IVE EVER SEEN. Phew. Ok. Done yelling. No but really. And yeah they’re small, but not crazy small. It’s a tea light. What are people expecting? I’m super impressed and glad I purchased these, and since none broke, now I get to keep the extras! Yay!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Love these! Great for a gift or to just add some character to the room.
customer_reviews.author: Vick Grubbs

customer_reviews.title: Cute lil cacti
customer_reviews.text: Gave these out as mini gifts to coworkers and they were a big hit. Very cute! Had to keep a couple for myself to add a tiny bit of cheer to my desk lol.
customer_reviews.author: melzie_fire

customer_reviews.title: totally adorable
customer_reviews.text: I used these for a take-home gift for a baby shower and they were a huge hit! So smol and cute.

customer_reviews.title: Very cute but wax melts onto the table
customer_reviews.text: These are so cute but you need to put something underneath them or the wax will melt onto whatever surface it is on.

customer_reviews.title: Cute and great quality
customer_reviews.text: I bought these as a part of baby shower favors and they turned out so cute. They even lasted on my front porch in the heat of day without melting. Super cute!

customer_reviews.title: So adorable!

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Trendy Party Favors

customer_reviews.title: Cute!!!!!

customer_reviews.title: Very pretty!

customer_reviews.title: Small
customer_reviews.text: I'm more of a visual person, and this is MUCH smaller than I expected. They're the size of a half dollar or so, but the description states the dimensions. They are quite beautiful, just tiny.

customer_reviews.title: Cute but poor quality
customer_reviews.text: I put each one in a glass votive. The votive got so hot they ruined 3 table cloths and 1 table.

customer_reviews.title: Great purchase and quality!

customer_reviews.title: So cute!

customer_reviews.title: Great gifties
customer_reviews.text: Great little gifts for your friends and family. These were a perfect addition to my little Christmas assortment gifts I put together for my friends and family last year.

customer_reviews.title: Very cute

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Great buy, perfect gift for something that's under 20 bucks. quick delivery, def will buy again.

customer_reviews.title: Very cute gift
customer_reviews.text: I ordered these to split up among gift bags for my bridesmaids, and they're so cute and affordable I already plan on ordering them again for small birthday and Christmas gifts.

customer_reviews.title: Adorable
customer_reviews.text: These are so cute and the gift box adds a nice touch. I used them to fill a pair of 5” glass globe terrariums. Since there is not enough sunlight, I was unable to successfully grow succulents in my dark living room. These candles are a nice replacement and I feel they add a more personal touch than fake plastic succulents since they are actually useful.
